dialogs.quitTheApp: Do you want to close the app?
dialogs.aboutDesc2: Visit {homepage} to view the code, report bugs and give stars!
dialogs.overwriteGame: Starting a new game will delete an ongoing Single Play game.
dialogs.whichGroundSize: What size playing field would you like to play on?
dialogs.groundSize5: Beginners level, takes a couple of minutes
dialogs.groundSize9: Enhanced size, if 7 x 7 is not enough
dialogs.whatRole: What role would you like to take on?
dialogs.whatRoleOrder: The computer is Chaos and starts the game.
dialogs.whatRoleChaos: The computer is Order, but you start the game.
dialogs.whatRoleOrderForMultiPlay: Your opponent is Chaos and starts the match.
dialogs.whatRoleChaosForMultiPlay: Your opponent is Order, but you start the match.
dialogs.whatRoleBoth: You play both roles, perhaps with a friend on the same device.
dialogs.whatRoleNone: The computer plays alone, you just observe.
dialogs.whatRoleInviteeDecides: Your opponent decide whether they is Order or Chaos, thus starting the game.
dialogs.whatKindOfMatch: What kind of match do you want to play?
dialogs.whatKindOfMatchHylexStyle: Both Order and Chaos can score points. The player with the most points wins. The match ends after one game.
dialogs.whatKindOfMatchClassicStyle: Only Order can score points. A match consists of two games. After the first game, the players swap roles. The player with the most points wins.
dialogs.yourName: What is your name? Your opponent will see this name. Please choose a short name.
dialogs.resetAchievements: Do you really want to reset all achievements to zero?
dialogs.restartGame: Do you want to restart this game? The current state will be lost.
dialogs.skipMove: Do you really want to pass your move?
dialogs.askForRematchAgain: You already asked for a rematch, see {playId}.
dialogs.undoLastMove: Do you want to undo the last move from {recentRole}?
dialogs.undoLastTwoMoves: Do you want to undo the last move from {recentRole}? This will also undo the previous move from {currentRole}.
dialogs.wantToResign: Do you want to give up? Then you will lose this game.
dialogs.deleteFinalMatch: Are you sure you want to remove the match {playId}? This cannot be undone!
dialogs.deleteOngoingMatch: Are you sure you want to remove the match {playId}? After removal, you will no longer be able to play it!
